ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: He who will cause my death, then give me life;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Who will make me die, then give me life again,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Who will cause me to die and then will again restore me to life;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: He will cause me to die and will bring me back to life.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “And He will give me death, then resurrect me.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And Who will cause me to die, and then will bring me to life.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And He Who will cause me to die, then give me life;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: who makes me to die, then gives me life,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And Who causeth me to die, then giveth me life (again),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: He who will cause me to die and bring me back to life;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And He Who shall cause me to die, and then shall quicken me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: who will make me die, then He will bring me to life,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Who will cause me to die, and then to life (again);
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And Who will cause me to die, and then will bring me to life (again);
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: who makes me to die and then revives me,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: He who makes me die, and then revives me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And who will cause me to die and then bring me to life
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [26:81] and Who will make me die, then give me life,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And Who causeth me to die) in this worldly life, (then giveth me life (again)) on the Day of Judgement,
